name: coherent Rayleigh
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
simplif. Rayleigh scattering of coherent plane wave on on random particles (green)
Top: random phases
Middle: particle spread << wavelength,  thus coherent (all ~ in phase). -> interference rebuilt the plane wave.
Bottom: particle spread >>
Red: ref wave.

/*
I know at least some people also get this glitch, but I also heard that refreshing 
fixes it. I would love to be able to edit the shaders I've been working on for 
awhile, obviously if I make new ones I can save the link and skip the menu but
for my old shaders I didn't think to do that. I also don't have a twitter if
anyone wonders why I'm saying this here instead of trying to go report it to 
someone there. Also I wanted to make a shader that said text...
*/

#define L_SP 32
#define L_PD 46

float Letter(sampler2D Font,vec2 P,int L)
{
   return texture(Font,(P+vec2(L-(L/16)*16,15-L/16))/16.).x; 	   
}

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = 1.-(iResolution.xy-fragCoord)/iResolution.x;
    
    vec3 col = .25*cos(iTime+uv.xyx+vec3(0,2,4));
    
    int L = message[int(floor(uv.x*25.) + (24.-floor(uv.y*25.))*25.)];
    
    float f = Letter (iChannel0, fract(uv*25.), L)*step(uv.x, 1.);
    
    fragColor = vec4(col*(1.-f) + f,1);
}
